math.alttext: I_{\mu}({\bf n})=I_{0}\sin\theta_{\mu}({\bf n})+\frac{\Phi_{0}}{2\pi cR_{N}}% \frac{\partial\theta_{\mu}({\bf n})}{\partial t}+\eta_{\mu}({\bf n},t)

semantics.annotation: italic-I POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-mu POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( bold-n CLOSE:) RELOP:equals italic-I POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end TRIGFUNCTION:sine italic-theta POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-mu POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( bold-n CLOSE:) ADDOP:plus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start Phi POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 italic-pi italic-c italic-R POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-N POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start OPERATOR:partial-differential italic-theta POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-mu POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( bold-n CLOSE:) ARG:end ARG:start OPERATOR:partial-differential italic-t ARG:end ADDOP:plus italic-eta POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-mu POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( bold-n PUNCT:, italic-t CLOSE:)
I_{\mu}({\bf n})=I_{0}\sin\theta_{\mu}({\bf n})+\frac{\Phi_{0}}{2\pi cR_{N}}% \frac{\partial\theta_{\mu}({\bf n})}{\partial t}+\eta_{\mu}({\bf n},t)

math.alttext: \theta_{\mu}({\bf n})=\theta({\bf n}+{\bf\mu})-\theta({\bf n})-A_{\mu}({\bf n}% )=\Delta_{\mu}\theta({\bf n})-A_{\mu}({\bf n})

semantics.annotation: italic-theta POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-mu POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( bold-n CLOSE:) RELOP:equals italic-theta OPEN:( bold-n ADDOP:plus italic-mu CLOSE:) ADDOP:minus italic-theta OPEN:( bold-n CLOSE:) ADDOP:minus italic-A POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-mu POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( bold-n CLOSE:) RELOP:equals Delta POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-mu POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-theta OPEN:( bold-n CLOSE:) ADDOP:minus italic-A POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-mu POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( bold-n CLOSE:)
\theta_{\mu}({\bf n})=\theta({\bf n}+{\bf\mu})-\theta({\bf n})-A_{\mu}({\bf n}% )=\Delta_{\mu}\theta({\bf n})-A_{\mu}({\bf n})

math.alttext: A_{\mu}({\bf n})=\frac{2\pi}{\Phi_{0}}\int_{{\bf n}a}^{({\bf n}+{\bf\mu})a}{% \bf A}\cdot d{\bf l}.

semantics.annotation: italic-A POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-mu POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( bold-n CLOSE:) RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:2 italic-pi ARG:end ARG:start Phi POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end INTOP:integral POSTSUBSCRIPT:start bold-n italic-a POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start OPEN:( bold-n ADDOP:plus italic-mu CLOSE:) italic-a POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end bold-A MULOP:cdot italic-d bold-l PERIOD:.
A_{\mu}({\bf n})=\frac{2\pi}{\Phi_{0}}\int_{{\bf n}a}^{({\bf n}+{\bf\mu})a}{% \bf A}\cdot d{\bf l}.

\Delta_{\mu}\cdot I_{\mu}({\bf n})=\sum_{\mu}I_{\mu}({\bf n})-I_{\mu}({\bf n}-% {\bf\mu})=0.
